Field.Name: first-name

Field.Name: id
Field.Title: a unique identifier token for this member

Field.Name: maiden-name
Field.Title: the member's maiden name

Field.Name: formatted-name
Field.Title: the member's name formatted based on language

Field.Name: phonetic-first-name
Field.Title: the member's first name spelled phonetically

Field.Name: phonetic-last-name
Field.Title: the member's last name spelled phonetically
Field.Remark: This field might be omitted from some results depending on the member's privacy settings

Field.Name: formatted-phonetic-name
Field.Title: the member's name spelled phonetically and formatted based on language
Field.Remark: This field might be omitted from some results or return a value of private, depending on the member's privacy settings

Field.Name: headline
Field.Title: the member's headline (often "Job Title at Company")

Field.Name: location:(name)
Field.Title: Generic name of the location of the LinkedIn member, (ex: "San Francisco Bay Area")

Field.Name: location:(country:(code))
Field.Title: country code for the LinkedIn member
Field.Remark: Lower case values as defined by ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 standard.

Field.Name: industry
Field.Title: the industry the LinkedIn member has indicated their profile belongs to (Industry Codes)

Field.Name: relation-to-viewer:(distance)
Field.Title: the degree distance of the fetched profile from the member who fetched the profile
Field.Remark: Not available in /people/{id}/connections.

Field.Name: relation-to-viewer:(related-connections)
Field.Title: Contains brief connection/person objects indicating the connecting first degree members
Field.Remark: Not available in /people/{id}/connections. For each connection, id, first-name, and last-name is returned by default. You can fetch distance using field selectors, for e.g. relation-to-viewer:(related-connections:(id,first-name,last-name,distance))

Field.Name: current-status-timestamp
Field.Title: the timestamp, in milliseconds, when the member's status was last set
Field.Remark: Returns as empty if not in network

Field.Name: current-share
Field.Title: the member's current share, if set
Field.Remark: Overloaded to also return "current-status" (if there is no URL shared). (Status and share are the same.)

Field.Name: num-connections
Field.Title: the # of connections the member has
Field.Remark: Available in some places, such as /people/~/connections, when connections is not. More efficient than checking the total attribute of connections even when connections is available.

Field.Name: num-connections-capped
Field.Title: true if the value of num-connections has been capped at 500. false otherwise.
Field.Remark: Allows you to distinguish whether num-connections = 500 because the member has exactly 500 connections or actually 500+ because we're hiding the true value.

Field.Name: summary
Field.Title: A long-form text area where the member describes their professional profile
Field.Remark: Not available via connections API.

Field.Name: specialties
Field.Title: A short-form text area where the member enumerates their specialties
Field.Remark: Not available via connections API.

Field.Name: positions
Field.Title: A collection of positions a member has had, the total indicated by a total attribute
Field.Remark: See Positions Fields below. Only current positions are available for people other than the authenticated member.

FieldSelector.Name: positions:(id)

FieldSelector.Name: positions:(title)

Field.Name: last-modified-timestamp

Field.Name: proposal-comments

Field.Name: associations

Field.Name: interests

Field.Name: courses

Field.Name: volunteer

Field.Name: three-current-positions
Field.Title: A collection of positions a member currently holds, limited to three and indicated by a total attribute. You can use the <positions> collection to get the full set or use this collection to limit the return to just the first three positions.

Field.Name: three-past-positions
Field.Title: A collection of positions a member formerly held, limited to the three most recent and indicated by a total attribute. You can use the <positions> collection to get the full set or use this collection to limit the return to just the first three positions.

Field.Name: num-recommenders

Field.Name: recommendations-received

Field.Name: following

Field.Name: job-bookmarks

Field.Name: suggestions

Field.Name: date-of-birth
Field.Title: member's birth date

Field.Name: member-url-resources

Field.Name: related-profile-views
Field.Title: A collection of related profiles that were viewed before or after the member's profile

Field.Name: honors-awards
Field.Title: A collection of honors and awards the member specified in their LinkedIn profile

Field.Name: phone-numbers
Field.Title: a collection of phone numbers
Field.Remark: For each phone-number returned, you get a phone-type and phone-number child element. Possible values for phone-type are: home, work, and mobile.

Field.Name: bound-account-types
Field.Title: a collection of accounts bound by the member Remark=For each bound account returned, you get the following child elements: account-type, binding-status, is-primary, provider-account-id, provider-account-name child element

Field.Name: im-accounts
Field.Title: a collection of instant messenger accounts
Field.Remark: For each im-account returned, you get a im-account-type and im-account-name child element. Possible values for im-account-type are: aim, gtalk, icq, msn, skype, and yahoo.

Field.Name: main-address

Field.Name: id
Field.Title: Default. The unique internal numeric company identifier.

Field.Name: name
Field.Title: Default. The human readable name of the company.

Field.Name: universal-name
Field.Title: The unique string identifier for a company.

Field.Name: email-domains
Field.Title: Company email domains.

Field.Name: company-type
Field.Title: Type of company. Valid values are: C ("Public Company") D ("Educational") E ("Self Employed") G ("Government Agency") N ("Non Profit") O ("Self Owned") P ("Privately Held") S ("Partnership") Use this field instead of the deprecated type field.

Field.Name: ticker
Field.Title: Company ticker identification for the stock exchange. Available only for public companies.

Field.Name: website-url
Field.Title: Company web site address.

Field.Name: industries
Field.Title: A collection containing a code and name pertaining to the company's industry. See Industry Codes for the list of industries available.

Field.Name: status
Field.Title: Company status. Valid values are: OPR ("Operating") OPS ("Operating Subsidiary") RRG ("Reorganizing") OOB ("Out of Business") ACQ ("Acquired")

Field.Name: logo-url
Field.Title: URL for the company logo in JPG format.

Field.Name: square-logo-url
Field.Title: URL for the company logo in a square format.

Field.Name: blog-rss-url
Field.Title: URL for the company blog.

Field.Name: twitter-id
Field.Title: Handle for the company Twitter feed.

Field.Name: employee-count-range
Field.Title: Number range of employees at the company. Use this field instead of the deprecated size field. Valid values are: A:1 B: 2-10 C: 11-50 D: 51-200 E: 201-500 F: 501-1000 G: 1001-5000 H: 5001-10,000 I: 10,000+

Field.Name: specialties
Field.Title: Company specialties. Retrieves information from string input.

Field.Name: locations
Field.Title: Company location.

Field.Name: description
Field.Title: Company description. Limit of 500 characters.

Field.Name: stock-exchange
Field.Title: Stock exchange the company is in. Available only for public companies. Valid values are: ASE (1, "American Stock Exchange") NYS (2, "New York Stock Exchange") NMS (3, "NASDAQ") LSE (4, "London Stock Exchange") FRA (5, "Frankfurt Stock Exchange") GER (6, "XETRA Trading Platform") PAR (7, "Euronext Paris")

Field.Name: founded-year
Field.Title: Year listed for the company's founding.

Field.Name: end-year
Field.Title: Year listed for when the company closed or was acquired by another.

Field.Name: num-followers
Field.Title: The number of followers for the company's profile.

Field.Name: address
Field.Title: Address of location.

Field.Name: contact-info
Field.Title: Company contact information for the location.

Field.Name: street1
Field.Title: First line of street address of location.

Field.Name: street2
Field.Title: Second line of street address of location.

Field.Name: city
Field.Title: City for location.

Field.Name: state
Field.Title: State for location.

Field.Name: postal-code
Field.Title: Postal code for location. Matches companies within a specific postal code. Must be combined with the country-code parameter. Not supported for all countries.

Field.Name: country-code
Field.Title: Country code for location. Matches companies with a location in a specific country.

Field.Name: region-code
Field.Title: Region code for location.

Field.Name: phone1
Field.Title: Company phone number for the location.

Field.Name: phone2
Field.Title: Second company phone number for the location.

Field.Name: fax
Field.Title: Company fax number for the location.
